title: connection refused after idle for some time
body:
i have 4.5.1 running on a raspberry pi.  when i fire it up, it works fine.  and for a few days after it continues to function.  but after an undetermined amount of time, when i try to connect using a sync client or from the web interface, i get a "connection refused" error.  to regain access, i have to ssh into the pi and reboot.

here is an error log from my apache server (as i am guessing that this is where the error is happening)
